text.data-name:
WHAT ARE MY DELIVERY OPTIONS? Orders placed on OKI Online Store are prepared by OKI teams and delivered by either OKI Delivery or Canada Post.
OKI delivery (24h, available in Montreal) Standard delivery (2-7days, nationwide) Express delivery (1-3days, nat

tspan.tspan: WHAT ARE MY DELIVERY OPTIONS?
Orders placed on OKI Online Store are prepared by OKI teams
and delivered by either OKI Delivery or Canada Post.
OKI delivery (24h, available in Montreal)
Standard delivery (2-7days, nationwide)
Express delivery (1-3days, nationwide)

text.data-name:
WHAT ARE YOUR RETURN/EXCHANGE POLICIES? For hygiene and safety reasons, foods, drinks and personal care products cannot be returned except for defective, damaged, or expired issues.
If you meet any of defective, damaged, or expired issues, you have 3 ways

tspan.tspan: WHAT ARE YOUR RETURN/EXCHANGE POLICIES?
For hygiene and safety reasons, foods, drinks and personal care products
cannot be returned except for defective, damaged, or expired issues.
If you meet any of defective, damaged, or expired issues, you have 3 ways to report the issue and submit a claim:
1. Use Online Chatting Service by clicking on the Customer Service Floating Window
the Service is available Monday through Friday from 10am to 5pm ET.
2. Use the HELP CENTRE located at the bottom of our webpage.
3. Click on
, go to
My orders
, find the problem order, then click on
Need help?
and follow the instructions.
For products with defective, damaged, or expired issues:
Retail orders can be claimed within 7 days from the date of receipt.
Group orders can be claimed within 3 days from the date of receipt.
When requesting for refunds/replacements, please attach at least 3 photos to clearly indicate
the product packaging, date, and problems.
Once we receive your claims, we will proceed to solve your problems immediately,
please allow the Customer Care Team up to 7 days to process your request.
After we approved your claim:
1. For claimed products under $20. The refund will be made by crediting the payment method used for payment
within 14 days of approval. Depends on the processing time of the financial institution.
2.For claimed products over $20. We will replace your claimed products within 7 days of approval.
